mapper.select: SELECT c.COMMENT_ID AS commentId, c.BAL_ID AS balId, c.USER_ID AS userId, u.NICKNAME AS userName, v.SNAP_MBTI AS mbti, c.CONTENT AS content, TO_CHAR(c.CREATE_AT,'HH24:MI') AS createAt FROM BAL_COMMENT c JOIN USERS u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID JOIN BAL_VOTE v ON c.BAL_ID = v.BAL_ID AND c.USER_ID = v.USER_ID WHERE c.BAL_ID = #{balId} ORDER BY c.CREATE_AT ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BAL_COMMENT (COMMENT_ID, BAL_ID, USER_ID, CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BAL_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{balId}, #{userId}, #{content})
